string.value: They say that Cassandra has prepared a fun event in commemoration of the Halloween Season. Would you like to learn more about it?

Cassandra has asked that you bring her 31 Green Halloween Stick Candies. The candies are carried by Monsters during the Halloween season, and Cassandra says that the monsters in the Haunted Mansion have more than others. Who knew that Cassandra had such a craving for sweets, but this should be easy, right?\n\n#i4032444:# #t4032444:# #c4032444# / 31

It's not certain whether Cassandra was happy because she received the candies or because she pulled off a trick... Regardless, it always feels good to help someone, no? You can receive another Halloween task if you return to Cassandra after 1 hour.
Trick or treat! Halloween is upon us! What comes to your mind when you think of Halloween? The first thing that comes to my mind is the delicious Halloween Candies.

According to my sources, there are reports that the monsters possess a lot of these yummy Halloween candies. Can you bring me some of these #bGreen Halloween Stick Candies#k? I will give you a gift that you'll really like.I promise!

All of the monsters have the yummy Green Halloween Stick Candies that I'm looking for. But, according to rumors, the monsters in the Haunted Mansion possess more than others. Whatever the case, bring me #b31 Green Halloween Stick Candies#k! Hurry up now!
Really? You'll regret it if you miss out on the festivities... Why don't you think about it again?

Let's see... Have you brought all of the stick candies?\r\n ... #rWhat I want are 31 Green Halloween Candies #kthat the monsters currently possess. If you don't have them all, you can forget about the great gift I'll be giving you. Heh heh!
